order:
What was the color of the <N> shape to be visited?
Answer with only the color name.
max_dist:
Which color shape was the furthest from
the previous shape in the path?
Answer with only the color name.
min_dist:
Which color shape was the closest to
the previous shape in the path?
Answer with only the color name.
min_time:
Which color shape took the shortest amount
of time to reach from the previous shape?
Answer with only the color name.
max_time:
Which color shape took the longest amount
of time to reach from the previous shape?
Answer with only the color name.
